txt: I agree that Gen. Luna St. in Intramuros be turned into a  pedestrian-only street. We even walk long distances abroad as tourists, don't we?
Agree.
Just like in any other country
I think this is a great idea but, I would prefer that all buildings be restored/reconstructed first.
Intramuros should be a tourist, recreational and leisure destination.
Gusto kong tumira malapit sa parke or playground (I want to live near a park or playground.)
Nope. Nasa Gen luna ang office namin, kami naman papahirapan niyo.
We can used alternate road around intramuros.
Mahirap pong mgbyahe lalo na kung wala kang sarili sasakyan..lalo na kong malayo kapa sa pinagtratrabahohan.
Yes I agree!!That is a very good and welcoming idea! Go for it!!
Yes Ped Only Roads
Gusto kong tumira sa siyudad na walang sasakyan. (I want to live in a car-free city.)
Nothing to add.
Maari tayong magbukas ng mga panibagong kalsada sa loob ng intramuros. (We can build new roads inside the Intramuros.)
dangerous for other visitors
I agree with the proposal except obviously during the Intramuros Grand Marian Procession.
Nagmamay-ari ako ng negosyo sa loob ng intramuros. (I own a business in Intramuros.)
Great idea
Agree
Nagawa nila sa Vigan pwede rin magawa sa Intramuros
Mas maganda po kung lalagyan ng ped-only streets dahil mas nagiging immersive yung lugar.
disagree
It's a Big Yes and a for Safety reason's.thanks
Agree, but please identify the streets affected.
Mahalaga Ang pedestrian lane sa mga taong nag lalakad sa kalsada
Ang pagbibisikleta ay para sa mga lalaki lamang (Riding a bicycle is for men only.)
The whole intramuros should be pedestrian only and remove those illegal settlers Revive the old city and declare it a whole tourist spot.
As a student of Mapúa, I am all for active and e-transportation in Intramuros. However, I think a traffic impact assessment must be done.
Consult the business establishments located thereat. They are the stakeholders.
Thanks for initiative! It’s high time that we give the streets to the people! We need to be able to live more safely and freely.
Yes. Turn Gen. Luna into a pedestrian street only. Unless of course there is an emergency.
Goods
Yes. Pedestrianization is the future of cities.
I don't agree with it. What about the senior citizens or people with PWD - they will not be able to visit and eat at Intramuros
Cheryl Cahanap
Alam ko ang pagkakaiba ng pangangalaga at pagpapanumbalik. (I know how conservation is different from restoration.)
For the safety of the children and drivers should aware of this Amd it should be a 30speed limit zone
The interior of Intramuros itself is built based on the necessity of pedestrians, not cars.
More developed roads

Ang ibang kalye sa Intramuros ay dapat italagang protektadong pedestrian lane para mas ligtas ang paglalakad at pagbibisikleta dito.  (Some Intramuros roads should be allotted as protected pedestrian lanes for safer walking and cycling.)
Dapat magkaroon ng mga pampublikong lugar na ipinagbabawal ang paggamit ng mga sasakyan (We should have public places where cars are not allowed)
Better Public Transportation going there..
Mas mainam na ipagbawal ang mga motorized vehicles sa Intramuros. Maaaring libutin ang Intramuros nang naglalakad, gamit ang bike at kalesa
Maliban sa economic benefits ng foot traffic, mainam na ligtas ang paglalakad at pagbibisekleta at makita ang lumang ganda ng intramuros.
Gumagamit ako ng pampublikong transportasyon para makapaglibot sa Intramuros. (I use public transport to get around Intramuros.)
Yes
It does not matter if one owns a car or not!
Kailangan exclusively for walking lang.
The initiatives will give way to preservation of our cultures and history. Yes
Whole of Intramuros should be pedestrian only streets, sirs
Residente ako ng Intramuros. (I am a resident of Intramuros.)
ang kalsada ay para sa mga tao, hindi para sa sasakyan.
Many districts of the city of Manila would be improved by banning cars and parking, including Binondo and Quiapo.
YESSS! I DEFINITELY AGREE SO THAT THE PEOPLE CAN HAVE THE BEST VIEW OR ANGLE IN TERMS OF PHOTOG W/O WORRYING THE VEHICLES PASSING BY!!
Ang paglalakad ay hindi dapat mapanganib (Walking should not be dangerous)
I am not in favor. This is only one of the rare places where u could experience Spanish Era apart from Vigan.
my office is in Intramuros
Yes pedestrian only
Yes!!!
I agree with the proposal of General Luna street, Intarmuros. It should be assigned pedestrian zones. To avoid traffic congestion.

Mas mahalaga ang pag unlad ng Intramuros kaysa sa pagsasaalang sa halagang pangkasaysayan ng mga kalsada nito. (It's more important to develop Intramuros rather than considering the historical value of its streets.)
Cars are too heavy for the cobblestone paved-road and they emit fumes that destroy the centuries-old structures.
Madalas akong bumisita sa Intramuros para pumasyal (I frequently visit Intramuros for sightseeing.)
Yes, I agree that more streets in Intramuros should be pedestrian-friendly.
Kailangan ng mas maraming lugar na pang tao kaysa kotse, lalo na sa mga historical and cultural sites.
Kinakailangan ang sasakyan sa lahat ng kalsada sa Intramuros (Cars are needed on all streets in Intramuros)
main roads should not be the pedestrian lane, what should be considered is the inner roads that leads to churches and or historical sites.
I agree. I believe that the change will greatly help in the preservation of Intramuros.
Mapanganib ang paglalakad sa kalsada (Walking on a street is dangerous.)
Yes. Madrid, Barcelona and Amsterdam have done this. This is great for the environment. I suggest enclosing the entire wall for people.
May benepisyong pang ekonomiya ang pagpapanatili ng mga makasaysayang kalsada. (Historic roads have economic benefits)

Mabuting panatilihin ang orihinal na disenyo ng mga kalsada sa Intramuros at ayusin ang mga kalsada batay sa mga pamantayan ng Intramuros Administration. (It is good to maintain the original design of Intramuros roads, preserve its character and repair outstanding roads in accordance with the Intramuros Administration guidelines.)
Unsure
This is an excellent initiative by Intramuros Administration together with private organizations which we will support.
May bike o e-scooter ako. (I own a bike or e-scooter.)
Wala akong pagmamay-ari na sasakyan, bisikleta o e-scooter. (I don't own a car, bike or an e-scooter)
I think this is a GREAT idea and fully support it.
They could probably just make it pedestrian friendly for a few days, like how it's done at Paseo de Roxas.
Cars make spaces noisy and polluted.
It can be, as long as light vehicles are allowed.
I agree
Yes I agree that it should be pedestrianized. Batter late than never! More chance for Intramuros to be a UNESCO world heritage site. Thanks!
Great idea to spur visitors and tourists. Adequate well lit street lites & public security including enough safe public parkings is needed.
Caleza should be allowed after all it compliments the place
There must be some roads for pedestrians only.
Allowing more pedestrian- and biker-friendly lanes & establishments in Intramuros is beneficial to Intramuros' growth as a tourism site.
Yes. Calle Crisologo in Vigan, Ilocos Sur has done this. And it works. Thanks.
N/A
Preserve historic sites. Create public parks and open spaces. Establish bicycle-friendly cities. Provide safer sidewalks for pedestrians.
Agree Na Agree
Maybe to consider motorcycles to be allowed ( belong to light vehicles)
YES to pedestrian only initiative.
It's about time to have something like this
Yes. Most of intramuros should be pedestrianised. Designate parking areas outside, but have bike racks Inside.
Agree,the existing places/activities in the area are being/can be enjoyed/used by people, not vehicles.Creates a better link to Rizal Park.
I do agree to make General Luna Street a pedestrian Zone for it will conserve the integrity of those stones used in building those streets.
Yes. May ibang streets naman sa Intramuros kung saan pwede dumaan ang mga sasakyan. Ilaan ang Gen. Luna sa mga Pedestrians at  Pumapasyal.
Actually, pwede naman talagang for pedestrians and some vehicles. Just restrict those vehicles who parks at the side of the road.
We should and we must. The soon to be completed China bridge is a big threat in preserving our remaining heritage.
It is good. Yes I agree.
Good idea.
Pedestrians street only. No bikes allowed please.
Ang pagkakaroon ng mga kalsadang para sa mga naglalakad lamang  ay makakabuti sa turismo ng Intramuros. (Pedestrian-only streets would improve tourism in Intramuros.)
We should preserve the streets of Intramuros for future generations. The streets are also part of our identity.
Kung isasara ang gen luna which is the main road in intramuros, saan nyo padadaanin ang sasakyan? Sa bonifacio(traffic) drive?
Ang Intramuros ay mas mapagmamasdan kung naglalakad
Agree, but increase parking spaces n mobility measures.
Nagmamay-ari ako ng sasakyan. (I own a car.)
To preserve the street from damage caused by vehicles
Agree to the initiative
Tour guide
Mas mahalaga sa akin ang mas maraming parking lot at kalsada kaysa sa parke at pampublikong lugar (Parking lots and streets are more important to me than parks and public spaces)
I already shared my statement
Yes, provided we and IA realize that pedestrianization is a strategy that serve measurable goals, limits, etc.
Ang pagkakaroon ng mga kalsadang para sa mga naglalakad lamang ay makakabuti sa aking negosyo. (Pedestrian-only streets would improve my business.)
Kung ano po ang nakakarami ay okay lang sa akin, gawin mang pedestrian only lane or not, it's how strict you implement this initiative.
Magandang maglakad dyan sa Intramuros gaya nung student ako sa PLM nòng 1970s.
Thank you
Importanteng magamit ng mga sasakyan ang Gen Luna Street specifically  para sa okasyon gaya ng kasal sa napaka historic na San Agustin.
I much rather walk
Ang pagkakaroon ng mga kalsadang para sa mga naglalakad lamang ay makakasama sa aking negosyo. (Pedestrian-only streets would harm my business.)
Lahat po tayo ay kailangan ang kalsada sa mga motorista at pedestrian. Basta may alternative route sa motorista ay agree sa pedetrian lane.
In my opinion, if it is a pedestrian only street, then all motorized vehicles should not be allowed.
Yes 😊😊😊
Less cars and especially tourist buses that congests the streets.
I seldom pass General Luna
Okay
Less pollution and also it will lessen the traffic
Yes. I agree to designate general luna street as pedestrian only street
NO
Developing Intramuros as a pedestrian friendly district will help other districts in metro manila develop their own districts differently
Mobility
Dapat gamitin lamang ang kalsada ng Intramuros sa paglalakad at pagbibisikleta upang mapangalagaan at mapreserba Lalo ang mga Instraktura.
Most of Intramuros’ historic streets should be fully pedestrianized.
Yes. Pedestrian street only except for an emergency.
Pedestrian only. Less carbon footprint
There is no other Intramuros to remind us .Lets keep it well
We should encourage people-centered spaces in Manila, I think this would be a good initiative, especially for young people.
Security is important
Hindi dapat maglakad ang mga tao sa  kalsada (Roads are no place for people to walk on.)
Mas ok ang Gen Luna to be "pedestrian only" street.  It links six distinct Walk Tour destinations which are to-see experience while walking
Gusto ko ng lugar na maraming ligtas na palaruan at malalakaran ang mga bata. (I want my city to have many places  where children can walk and play safely.)
Yes, mapanganib dahil may mga kalsada sa Intramuros na malalim baha pag umuulan.
Great initiative! It will improve air quality and encourage a leisure walk around the walled city- best enjoyed without the traffic.
The concern is to improve mobility. So bakit gagawin pedestrian only? At bakit ngayon pandemic? So its more safe to walk along side people?
Pedestrianized streets should serve a purpose, not for the sake of it. Street level establishments & pedestrian furniture must be considered
Dapat may pedestrian only roads.
Masarap mamasyal ng maluwag sa intramuros
agree. di mo kasi maenjoy ang view, andaming nadaang sasakyan.
By doing so, we encourage environment friendlier Inttamuros.
No, may mga existing kalsada na sa bawat kanto.
Yes! Intramuros together with its historical values will be much appreciated. Please have the whole stretch made with cobblestones!
Kung ipopromote ang paglalakad sa Intramuros, mas mabibigyang pansin ang mga historical markers.
Pedestrian lanes are for pedestrians.
I agree that some streets should be limited to pedestrians.
I agree po! Bilang residente ng Intramuros, challenge pa rin sa akin dumaan lagi sa Gen. Luna papasok ng work sa dami ng mga sasakyan.
Make it safe for local and foreign tourist from holduppers, pickpockets, and mendicants. Build random PAY public toilets with toiletries.
Preservation of Historical sites is imperative and we can achieve that by limiting vehicles in some streets inside the Walled City.
Pedestrian only streets please
This is a very worthy initiative. The pedestrian must be allowed to reclaim at least part of the streets.
Di kailangan ng malawak na sidewalk. Ang kailangan ay patag at tuloy-tuloy na daan na pwedeng magamit ang wheelchair mula sa pinagbabaan.
Mainam na isara ang ibang kalye sa mga motorista (It is alright to close streets to motorized vehicles.)
To attract more tourists, yes to pedestrian only!
sana po pati ung sa Sta Lucia maging Pedestrian Street na rin
preservation
pedestrian only streets will be good for businesses and tourism
Calezas should be allowed it compliments the whole Intramuros milieu
Yes! Pedestrian only streets allow visitors to experience Intramuros more intimately without the dangers of motorized traffic.
For more pleasant, safer, and relaxed walking experience
Kahit na maari akong gumamit ng bisikleta o e-scooter, mas pipiliin ko pa din ang paggamit ng sasakyan. (Even though I have the option to use a bike, I would still use my car)
I guess if the IA is really for the preservation of the place, it is best that Intramuros should be transportation-free
Mas maganda maraming kalsada para sa mga sasakyan para mabawasan ang trapik
None
Maraming ahensya ng Gobyerno apektado sa pagsasara ng kalsada. mahalaga ang alternatibong madadaan palabas. Matrapik na nga, babawasan pa
No cars, open facades for shops (no dead streets), lots of street vendors, interaction with people, accessible to PWDs, no onstreet parking
Think this over. Will the other roads absorb the capacity?
Yes need po para sa mga pedestrian for the safety po. Much better mag lagay ng enforcer.
It will surely benefit our tourism industry.
Greatly needed for preservation.
Laking tulong to sa mga nagtitinda, ganda rin maraming matutuwa, maeenganyo tayo sabay dadami bibisita sa intra.
Pwede siguro ito gawin tuwing weekends lang. Hindi rin kasi maiiwasan na hindi dumaan ang mga sasakyan dito lalo na't may mga opisina dito
Maganda sana maretrieve lahat ng sidewalk sa Manila.
restoration
Its a good idea
Need to fix street to be compatible with walking, cycling, etc.  driving a car thru luna is already bone-jarring due to uneven cobblestones.
Ang pagbibisikleta o paglakad ay mabuting paraan upang magawa ang mga kailangan gawin na malapit sa bahay. (Biking or walking is a good way to take care of errands close to home.)
Nothing to say
Ang kalsada ay para sa mga sasakyan lamang (Roads were made for cars only)
Sana isunod yung mga informal settler sa loob ng Intramuros.
Super agree because i love to walk on that area.
I think it's just right to assign some streets in Intamuros for pedestrians only coz pag may mga cars na dadaan nasisira yung road .
Ìntramuros should be more easily accessible through (and better connected to) public transport.
Pwede yang pedestrian-only road para hindi na makapangikil yung mga parking boys pero sana meron pa ring sapat na parking area.
Wala akong sasakyan o motor
No pedicab pls.but the whole idea is great and my vote is hundred percent yes.
palayasin niyo na rin yung mga iskwater na holdaper at buraot dyan sa intramuros..
Sana pwede pa din daanan ng mga motor vehicles ang mga intersection along General Luna if ever matuloy ito
Open roads to all vehicles.
Thank you.
Pedestrian only
I strongly support this initiative!
Agree. We must ensure safety of pedestrians by allowing more oedestrian lanes within hisroric centers
Few streets should be pedestrianized. Given the volume of tourists going to intramuros. It is better to walk as pedicabs charge high prices
Mahirap magmaneho ng sasakyan sa loob ng Intramuros. (It is difficult to drive a car in Intramuros.)
just for walking
Sayang sa espasyo ang mga parke (Parks are a waste of space.)
Agree to this.
Ninanais kong mas marami ang taong nagbibisikleta kaysa sa mga nagmamaneho ng sasakyan (I wish there were more people riding bicycles than cars.)
Agree, to assign pedestrian streets only
Ipatupad ang tamang regulayon at batas
Ang mga kalsada ay dapat idinisenyo para sa mga sasakyan lamang. (Roads should be designed mainly around cars.)
Pedestrians should be the priority not cars.
Gusto ko ng malawak na bangketa sa aking barangay (I want wide sidewalks in my neighborhood.)
Inclusive mobility must be promoted in and outside of Intramuros
Mas mahalaga ang paggawa ng mga bagong parke at palaruan kaysa sa mga bagong kalsada para sa sasakyan (It is more important to create new parks and playgrounds than new roads for cars.)
Preservation is utterly needed, no amount of our present efforts can replace a treasure such as the whole Intramuros.
Yes but not General Luna street, because that's the main highway.
No, nagsasabay ang pag-unlad na walang mai-sakripisyong bahagi ng kasaysayan.
hindi dapat gawing cobblestone ang mga kalye. mahirap para sa wheelchair, bisikleta at malilit ang gulong, maskit ang ugtol pag cobbletone.
I agree, especially those streets with important and beautiful structures that may be more appreciated if you walk leisurely.
People will be able to enjoy Intramuros more on foot/bike. Looking forward to this initiative eventually extended to the whole Intramuros
Nothing.
I agree that some of the streets assigned as pedestrian zones
Yes, I agree
Dapat itong gawin para mas mabawasan ang mga kotse at mas dumami ang mga naglalakad, bisikleta/EKS/LMV, at pampublikong transportasyon.
I have nothing to say.
Definitely A lot of tourists and even students can be seen biking within the walls and have helped in making the district more full of life
Am for preserving the original structure of bldgs and streets in Intramuros.
may parking space naman sa na designated sa mga public places like going to the parks, markets,  malls etc,
dapat i limit. bawasan at i define kung ano ang mga uri ng sasakayan ang dapat dumaan sa intramuros
Not just General Luna, but the entire Intramuros should be pedestrial only with e-trikes ferry people around and parking areas near the wall
I think more pedestrian zones would increase tourism in Intramuros as its much better to marvel at its heritage while on foot.
Agree. That will not only preserve the ambiance of the area but will also make it safer for tourists walking on the street
The initiative is long overdue. Hoping that it will be finally implemented.
Inconvenience and unpractical as road is for vehicles and pedestrian can use pavement
No, depende sa sa kalagayan ng mga tao, as long na merong parking areas na malaki.
HIndi dapat nagbibisikleta ang mga tao sa  kalsada (Bicycles should not be ridden on the road.)
not agree
so that tourists will enjoy walking in a much wider road comfortably😊
As a historical site Intramuros the Walled City should be preserved its architectural artifacts s well as its original form.
Yes i agree because it will put everything in proper
Yes make it for pedestrians only. Or you can allow vehicles like delivery vans cross early morning or late evening like in othercountries.
Gen. Luna St. would still be the main road which motorised vehicles will use. I will be glad to join the group who will study the matter.
I think it is better to make Gen. Luna street a pedestrian-only street to protect not only the pedestrians but also the cobblestones
Ok lang yung gawin pedestrian ang karamihan ng mga kalye jan sa Intramuros basta't visible palage yung mga guards ng IA.
must protect and preserve it for posterity.
Wala sanang nagbebenta sa daan na yan
Pedestrianizing General Luna Street will actually improve the visitor experience and the overall value of Intramuros.
Pedestrian-only street
I usually just walk around Intramuros so I can enjoy the views more
My son  study at mapua.... Ag problem ko ying mga dinadaanan ng mga student... Kasi madidilim at maraming street people na nakakatakot..
Long time coming, “But”  Parking zones for visitors should be clear and identified,so visitors know where to go and park their cars.
It needed and organize
Solana street is a good alternative in lieu of Gen. Luna. It's near the 3 big schools, Mapua, Lyceum & Letran. The road needs to be widened
Preserve the block europian style nice to walk with
This has been a long time proposal of within Intramuros, and i believe that it is a project worth looking into and discussed.
I disagree to this proposal to make it as a pedestrian lane. I still prefer this street to be open for vehicles.
yes. at sana gawin cobblestones ang buong kahabaan ng gen. Luna
Only if other streets are cleared and one-way is strictly implemented.   There are a lot of offices in Intramuros. Think of us too.
Ok yan...
Bisita ako madalas sa Intramuros (I am a frequent visitor in Intramuros).
Bakit hindi yung secondary road ang gawin nyong pedestrian only.
Magandang gawing pedestrian-only street para mas ma-enjoy ng tao ang mga mahahalaga sa kasaysayan at mahikayat ang tao bumili street foods
General Luna St. deserves to be pedestrians- road only. Vehicles will only destroy the surroundings for future generations to appreciate.
Yes for pedestrian only streets
We are in dire need of streets for motor vehicles. Even the existing streets are not sufficient to accommodate the volume of traffic.
Agree that Intramuros should be made pedestrian only street. Delivery vehicles can come in at designated window hours.
Mainam ang pag gamit ng bisikleta o paglalakad bilang paraan ng pag ikot sa loob ng Intramuros. (In Intramuros, biking or walking provide a good means of basic transportation.)
Streets should be safe for walking and cycling.
Good for the environment and people can walk and appreciate the beautiful historic place.
Prioritize pedestrians and small transport like pedicabs and calesas that provide livelihood to the people living in and around Intramuros.
General Luna street and other side streets Inside Intramuros should become PEDESTRIAN ONLY. And please return the cobblestone on that road.
Aside from pedestrianization, public transport should be strategically planned for other considerations.
Ang mga sasakyan ang pinakaimportanteng paraan ng transportasyon sa loob ng Intramuros (Cars are the most important means of transportation in Intramuros)
Dapat well lighted ang mga street.
Yes please. Let us make most streets as pedestrian only, except the public transportation routes.
Yes, I agree to the plan or proposal to designate general luna street to be designated as pedestrian only street. Thank you.
The best way to appreciate the walled city is on foot,
I agree to close some streets of Intramuros just like during the Wow Philippines days.  It's exciting to stroll and dine along the streets.
The best way to explore and experience Intramuros is by walking through it. Please provide a good and informative map.
I don't agree- senior citizen, pwd and tourists can no longer visit Intramuros.
wala
Walking, jogging or cycling are healthy activities and do not contribute to green house gas emissions.
Yes , to avoid traffic and safety of the tourists who prefer a walking Tour. Intramuros is best to walk around or bike to explore the area.
"Pedestrian-only" is confusing since light elec vehicles (define pls!) and bicycles are included. Green, active mobility in Intramuros!
Gusto kong maglakad papunta sa trabaho kung malapit lamang ito (I want to be able to walk to work if it’s nearby)
having side walk for pedestrian and bike lane as a very good idea for all people who are visiting or working inside intramuros.
i agree.   old streets, old town historical places should be preserved.   that is what is the Intramuros Administration is for.
I’m okay for General Luna Street’s pedestrianization. This will allow better walking experience for locals and tourists.
I love this! More pls
Inconvenience n unpractical, road is supposedly for vehicles while pedestrian can use the pavement.
Areas for parking for residents, commercial , business &  visitors.
Don dx
Agreed to the idea...walking inside the wall is the way to understand and appreciate it better
Yes, basta maayos din yung mga kalyeng para sa mga sasakyan. We don't want a repeat of Lito Atienza's blunder on Avenida Rizal.
I THINK THE TWO SHOULD GO HAND IN HAND
A great project ...to preserve and educate people regarding history and heritage...we support...
No parking on the streets.  Kahit sa mga establishments.  Dapat may designated parking for etrike, tricycle.  No tric along A. Soriano Ave
Agree. Pedestrian only and also other streets if possible.
Yes. Make Gen. Luna st. Pedestrian only St.
To ensure implementation, make sure to open all gates early.  530 am is early enough.
I agree that some streets should be assigned as pedestrian zones for the visitor within Intramuros or simply tourists.
It should be! In fact, make the whole Intramuros a pedestrian-only area. It makes Intramuros more people-friendly and saves its heritage.
Nagtatrabaho ako sa Intramuros. (I work in Intramuros.)
It would be good.
Magkano ba lahat yan intramuros bibilin ko ibabalik ko sa panahon 1898?
Ang  kalsada ay hindi para sa mga tao (Streets are not for people)
We need a breathing space in Manila free from all sorts of smoke and unpleasant smell. Intramuros is also historical. We walk thru history
For the safety of the people ,no noise within the vicinity,is a form to avoid crime within the walls of iNtramuros ,to promote ecology
Cars are nothing more but obstructions in the inner city
Yes! I agree to attract more tourist!
At least allow calesa for vintage effect, with free rides for senior /pwd.
Sang-ayon ako para dito lalo na upang higit na makita ang ganda ng daang ito na kakikitaan ng mga makasaysayang istruktura.
Ang pagbibisikleta papuntang trabaho ay para sa mahihirap lamang (Riding a bicycle to work makes you look poor.)
Heritage is the nation's soul.
Pwede naman basta maglagay po kyo ng mga parking area para sa mga katulad nmin na may motor.. mgndang idea yan.. gudluck po sa inyo
Its not safe to walk along roads now that we have pandemic. It will not promote mobility if you lessen available roads for motorists.
Maaaring gawing car-free zone mismo ang buong Intramuros ng weekend. Kung pilot st. ang Luna, sang ayon ako rito. Pedestrians ang mahalaga.
Yes, to enjoy the Intramuros experience, walking through it is the best way to go.
Making general luna pedestrian-only is a stupid, all optics move. Declog cabildo, victoria, and other streets 1st!
We disagree
Intramuros should be preserved as a historicl site
some more streets within Intramuros
It's a must that vehicle owners respect the rights of people who deserve a clean and safe street...Saludo po ako diyan.
Outer streets cab be used by vehicles but make sure the streets are fixed before this initiative to avoid gridlock.
It is a good initiative because when general luna became a pedestrial people will appreciate more the beauty of heritage structures.
yes
Intramuros should prioritize pedestrians and cyclists
It's good have this kind of alley that we can freely walk
Agree. Some streets should be designated as pedestrian-only.
Agree on pedestrian only streets.
Yes, Gen. Luna must a pedestrian-only street, but make sure it is safe particularly at night.
#Pedestriansnaman ang ating bigyang prayoridad! Hindi lahat ng pumupunta sa Intramuros ay naka sasakyan.
Intramuros should be a pedestrian only zone.
agree
Pedestrianization must be diligently studied before implementation
If ever Gen. Luna will be limited to pedestrians only, what will happen to workers in Intramuros who have vehicle?
Its a great idea and good for all visitors to have a  safe experience of historical walk with less carbon and noise pollution
Since i work in comelec intramuros i noticed that there are few pedestrian lines for people who are walking along the area.
Agree. It's time to make communities, esp in manila, human-centric.
Yes please! Make the the streets of intramuros more pedestrian friendly :)
will likely cause traffic
I agree but my concern is the drop off points of the guests especially the PWDs.
I want to walk and explore intramuros
